mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )

choose.when: where title like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' or content like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' or writer in (select userid from member where name like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%')
where writer in (select userid from member where name like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%')
